title: UFYB 110: Dating, Perfectionism & Anxious Attachment
itunes:title: Dating, Perfectionism & Anxious Attachment
description:
This week, I’m taking a topic I’ve discussed on the podcast before a step further. Attachment theory is something you might believe in, or you might not, but I think it’s useful to discuss it to see how it’s affecting your relationships, especially in terms of your dating life. 

Get full show notes and more information here: http://unfuckyourbrain.com/110
content:encoded:
This week, I’m taking a topic I’ve discussed on the podcast before a step further. Attachment theory is something you might believe in, or you might not, but I think it’s useful to discuss it to see how it’s affecting your relationships, especially in terms of your dating life. 

Get full show notes and more information here: http://unfuckyourbrain.com/110
itunes:subtitle: How perfectionism and all or nothing thinking contributes to an anxious attachment style.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
